item.title: 欧盟法院顾问驳回Meta公司对欧盟反垄断数据要求的抗辩
item.description: 欧洲最高法院一名顾问周四支持Meta Platforms公司对抗欧盟反垄断监管机构的立场。这家美国科技巨头称，在针对该公司的两项调查中，监管机构提出了异常的信息要求。【原文：An adviser to Europe's top court on Thursday backed Meta Platforms' fight against EU antitrust regulators over what the U.S. tech giant said were aberrant requests for information from the later during two investigations into the company.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德表示，目前尚未出现由人工智能引发的大规模裁员浪潮。
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德周四表示，人工智能正在提升欧元区生产力，但尚未因劳动力自动化程度提高而引发大规模裁员浪潮。【原文：Artificial intelligence is boosting productivity in the euro zone but it is not yet causing a wave of layoffs due to greater automation of labour, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国百度季度营收超预期
item.description: 中国最大搜索引擎运营商百度周四公布的季度营收超出市场预期，其云业务的强劲增长有效抵消了核心广告业务持续疲软带来的冲击。【原文：China's largest search engine operator Baidu topped market estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday, as strong growth in its cloud business helped cushion the hit from persistent weakness in its mainstay advertising business.】

item.title: 对美国投资者心存戒备，格陵兰议员推动通过外国投资审查法
item.description: 去年初美国买家对努克房产的兴趣激增，促使立法者紧急出台限制外国购房的措施，并改变了格陵兰岛即将出台的外国投资审查法的重点方向。熟悉此事的议员及其他人士透露。【原文：A surge in property interest from U.S. buyers in Nuuk early last year prompted lawmakers to rush through curbs on foreign purchases and shifted the focus of Greenland's upcoming foreign-investment screening law, lawmakers and other people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 曼集团股价下跌，利润下滑，资产规模创纪录
item.description: 曼集团股价周四下跌，此前这家在伦敦上市的对冲基金宣布其管理资产规模增长逾三分之一，创下历史新高，但受2025年上半年市场波动影响，其利润出现下滑。【原文：Man Group shares fell on Thursday after the London- listed hedge fund posted a rise in assets under management by over a third to a new record, but profits fell against a backdrop of market volaility during the first half of 2025.】

item.title: 美国商务部长与印度部长就贸易问题展开磋商，此前数日特朗普政府加征关税的决定遭法院驳回。
item.description: 印度贸易部长皮尤什·戈亚尔周四在新德里与美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克共进午餐时，就贸易与经济伙伴关系进行了讨论。戈亚尔在X平台发文透露了这一消息，此前数日，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普实施的全球性关税政策已被裁定无效。【原文：India's Trade Minister Piyush Goyal discussed trade and economic partnership with U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick over lunch in New Delhi on Thursday, Goyal said in a post on X, days after President Donald Trump's sweeping global tariffs were invalidated.】

item.title: 日本高市早苗整顿日本央行理事会人选
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗任命两位货币政策鸽派人士进入央行董事会，此举传递出她对加息态度明确的信号，令政策收紧空间蒙上阴影。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's choice of two like-minded monetary doves to the central bank's board sends a not-so-subtle message about her distaste for higher interest rates, casting doubt on how much further policy can be tightened.】

item.title: 新加坡Grab押注人工智能与新服务，力争2028年前实现利润翻三番
item.description: 东南亚领先的网约车和外卖平台Grab正押注人工智能及拓展线上杂货、金融产品等新业务，公司总裁向路透社透露，此举旨在实现2028年前利润翻三倍的目标。【原文：Southeast Asia's top ride-hailing and delivery firm, Grab , is betting on artificial intelligence and expansion of new services such as online groceries and financial products to triple profit by 2028, the company's president told Reuters.】

item.title: 澳大利亚工会要求与WiseTech就人工智能引发的裁员问题紧急会谈
item.description: 澳大利亚一家工会组织已紧急要求与WiseTech Global公司会面，此前这家软件公司宣布将裁减约2000个岗位，作为其为期两年、与人工智能相关的重组计划的一部分。【原文：An Australian trade union has sought an urgent meeting with WiseTech Global after the software firm announced it would cut about 2,000 jobs as part of a two‑year artificial intelligence-linked restructuring.】

item.title: 币安押注希腊劳动力，为欧盟增长提供保障，联合首席执行官滕表示
item.description: 币安联合首席执行官滕博周四表示，当全球最大的加密货币交易所选择欧洲监管基地时，希腊的劳动力和安全优势使其在众多大型金融中心中脱颖而出。【原文：Binance co-CEO Richard Teng on Thursday said Greece's labour force and security profile gave it the edge over larger financial centres when the world's biggest cryptocurrency exchange was selecting a regulatory home in Europe.】

item.title: 彪马今年仍将亏损，为扭亏为盈取消分红
item.description: 德国运动服饰制造商彪马周四表示，尽管2025年亏损幅度小于预期，但仍预计今年将出现亏损。【原文：German sportswear maker Puma on Thursday said it still expected to report a loss this year, after reporting a narrower-than-expected loss in 2025.】

item.title: Stellantis因电动汽车减记在2025年下半年录得200亿欧元净亏损
item.description: Stellantis周四公布2025年下半年净亏损201亿欧元，此前该公司本月早些时候已披露该期间计提222亿欧元费用，因其缩减了电动汽车发展目标。【原文：Stellantis on Thursday reported a net loss of 20.1 billion euros for the second half of 2025, after flagging earlier this month 22.2 billion euros of charges in the period as it scaled back its electric-vehicle ambitions.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，苹果公司正与多家银行洽谈，计划在印度推出支付服务。
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，知情人士透露，苹果公司正与多家印度银行及全球信用卡网络展开磋商，为在印度推出Apple Pay服务做准备。【原文：Apple is in talks with several Indian banks and global card networks as it prepares to launch its Apple Pay service in India, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 施耐德超预期盈利，数据中心需求抵消美元疲软影响
item.description: 法国工业集团施耐德电气周四公布的财报显示，其核心收益超出预期，主要得益于数据中心需求的强劲增长。尽管面临美元走弱的压力，该集团仍维持了2026年的业绩展望。【原文：French industrial group Schneider Electric on Thursday reported stronger-than-expected core earnings, driven by robust data centre demand, supporting its 2026 outlook despite pressure from a weakening dollar.】

item.title: 欧洲复兴开发银行称，特朗普关税风波尚未影响新兴国家增长
item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行周四表示，美国关税已改变贸易流向，但并未如预期般严重冲击贸易，使某些发展中市场的经济增长超出预期。【原文：U.S. tariffs have rerouted trade, but not dented it as much as feared, allowing larger-than-expected economic growth in certain developing markets, the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development said on Thursday.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：英伟达表现亮眼，但好已不足为奇
item.description: 瑞薇带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 洞察：中国如何掩盖无人机飞行，为可能的台湾演习做准备
item.description: 近几个月来，一架大型中国军用无人机在南海上空定期飞行，同时发送虚假应答机信号，使其伪装成其他飞机，包括一架受制裁的白俄罗斯货运飞机和一架英国台风战斗机。【原文：A large Chinese military drone has conducted regular flights over the South China Sea in recent months while transmitting false transponder signals that made it appear to be other aircraft, including a sanctioned Belarusian cargo plane and a British Typhoon fighter jet.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官为投资者做好准备，迎接与英特尔、AMD的新一轮竞争
item.description: 英伟达或许是凭借专用于驱动人工智能服务器的图形处理器（GPU）积累了巨额财富，但其首席执行官黄仁勋却日益公开表达对通用处理器（CPU）的青睐。【原文：Nvidia may have made its immense fortune on the back of specialized graphics processing units (GPUs) used to power artificial intelligence servers, but CEO Jensen Huang is increasingly professing his love for the more generalist CPU.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，尽管中美达成贸易休战协议，美国航空航天和芯片行业稀土短缺问题仍在加剧
item.description: 美国航空航天和半导体企业的供应商正面临日益加剧的稀土短缺问题，据行业人士透露，在特朗普总统预计将于北京举行中美首脑会晤的前几周，已有两家供应商拒绝了部分客户的订单。【原文：Suppliers to U.S. aerospace and semiconductor firms face worsening rare earth shortages, with two turning away some clients, industry insiders said, weeks before U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to meet his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping for a summit in Beijing.】

item.title: 韩国监管机构因施压供应商、拖延付款对Coupang处以160万美元罚款
item.description: 韩国反垄断监管机构周四表示，已对Coupang处以22亿韩元（约合155万美元）罚款，因其胁迫供应商降价并承担额外成本以维持利润率，同时拖延向供应商付款。【原文：South Korea's antitrust regulator said on Thursday it has fined Coupang 2.2 billion won ($1.55 million) for pressuring suppliers to cut prices and shoulder additional costs to meet profit margins, as well as for delaying payments to vendors.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称丰田计划通过金融机构出售约190亿美元股份
item.description: 据两位消息人士透露，丰田计划大规模减持战略股权，届时银行和保险公司将出售约190亿美元的丰田股份。此举将成为日本公司治理改革中的一个分水岭时刻。【原文：Toyota plans a large-scale unwinding of strategic shareholdings that would involve banks and insurance firms selling around $19 billion of its shares, two sources said, in what would mark a watershed moment in Japan's corporate governance reform.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，OpenAI聘请了Meta前苹果产品设计主管
item.description: 据《The Information》周三援引OpenAI发言人消息报道，该公司已聘请Meta旗下知名人工智能研究员庞若瑛。庞若瑛约七个月前从苹果公司加入Meta。【原文：OpenAI has hired Ruoming Pang, a high-profile AI researcher at Meta , who had joined the company from Apple about seven months ago, The Information reported on Wednesday, citing an OpenAI spokesperson.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，亚马逊对OpenAI的500亿美元投资可能取决于该公司是否上市或能否实现通用人工智能（AGI）。
item.description: 据《信息》周三报道，亚马逊计划向OpenAI投资高达500亿美元，该计划可能取决于这家人工智能开发商是否上市或实现通用人工智能（AGI）里程碑。报道援引知情人士消息称。【原文：Amazon's plan to invest up to $50 billion in OpenAI could depend on whether the AI developer goes public or achieves an artificial general intelligence (AGI) milestone, The Information reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 油价攀升，因美伊紧张局势使供应风险持续成为焦点
item.description: 周四油价攀升，徘徊在七个月高点附近，投资者正评估美伊谈判能否避免可能导致供应中断的军事冲突，不过美国原油库存增加限制了涨幅。【原文：Oil prices climbed on Thursday, hovering near seven-month highs, as investors gauged whether U.S.-Iran talks could avert a military conflict that risks supply disruptions, though gains were capped by a build in U.S. crude inventories.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因英伟达超预期而迎来解脱性反弹
item.description: 周四亚洲股市上涨，英伟达的强劲财报缓解了市场对人工智能引发的颠覆性影响和成本上升的担忧。与此同时，日元持续低迷，因日本利率前景不明朗而陷入困境。【原文：Asian stocks advanced on Thursday after upbeat earnings from Nvidia soothed concerns over AI-driven disruption and rising costs, while the yen was in the doldrums, bogged down by a murky rate outlook in Japan.】

item.title: 澳洲航空首席执行官表示，美国航线需求疲软被视为短期问题
item.description: 澳洲航空首席执行官范妮莎·哈德森周四表示，该公司美国航线需求疲软被视为短期问题。【原文：Qantas Airways CEO Vanessa Hudson said on Thursday that demand weakness on the Australian carrier's U.S. routes was viewed as a short-term issue.】

item.title: 国会将审议延长空间站寿命及NASA月球基地计划
item.description: 美国参议院一个委员会下周将审议延长国际空间站计划寿命两年的提案，以给企业更多时间研发替代方案。这是针对美国宇航局法案的若干修订之一，该法案旨在应对中国日益扩大的太空影响力。【原文：A U.S. Senate committee next week will consider extending the planned life of the International Space Station by two years to give companies more time to develop a replacement, one of a few changes to a NASA bill focused on rivaling China's growing footprint in space.】

item.title: 美元走软，英伟达提振投资者信心，关税消息缺席
item.description: 周四亚洲交易时段，美元开盘走软。英伟达超预期的财报提振了投资者信心，而市场正等待美国最新对外商品加征关税的具体细节。【原文：The dollar began the day on the back foot during the Asian trading session on Thursday, as better-than-expected earnings from Nvidia boosted investor confidence and markets awaited details of the latest U.S. tariffs on imports of foreign goods.】

item.title: 英国O2推出欧洲首款智能手机卫星服务
item.description: 英国维珍媒体O2公司周四推出欧洲首项卫星移动通信服务，每月仅需3英镑（约合4.06美元），即可让用户在无网络覆盖区域通过普通智能手机接收短信、使用WhatsApp及谷歌地图。【原文：Britain's Virgin Media O2 launched Europe's first satellite-to-mobile service on Thursday, bringing text messages, WhatsApp and Google Maps to customers using regular smartphones in locations with no network connection for three pounds ($4.06) a month.】

item.title: C3.ai在新任首席执行官推动的重组计划中裁减全球26%员工
item.description: 软件供应商C3.ai宣布，在新任首席执行官斯蒂芬·埃基安领导的重组计划中，将裁减全球26%的员工，同时预测本季度销售额低于预期，导致其股价在盘后交易中暴跌20%。【原文：Software provider C3.ai said it is cutting 26% of its global workforce as part of a restructuring push under new CEO Stephen Ehikian, and also forecast current-quarter sales below estimates, sending its shares down 20% in extended trading.】
